1477250.name: Puff Puff The Magic Pipe
1477250.description:
Puff Puff The Magic Pipe is the world's first 420-themed 3D platformer. Race against time as a magical pipe that must save his Best Buds before he faces total burnout!

Home Grown Level Generation

Puff Puff must run, jump, spin, and burn his way through randomly generated levels that can be as small as a dime to as large as a pound of goodness!
Every run is different!

Dank Powerups

Find voluptuous vapes, gorgeous gravity hits, lucky lighters, and more as you collect jars to unlock items which will aid in your quest!
1477250.supported_languages: 英语, 荷兰语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
